name: First Class Escape 2: Head in the Clouds
name_original: First Class Escape 2: Head in the Clouds
description:
"First Class Escape 2: Head in the Clouds” is a co-operative escape-room-style puzzle game, where you need to solve various puzzles as you make your way through a luxury airship.
You must make good use of your wits if you are to overcome the various challenges you will encounter.Features
Plenty of different kinds of puzzles from simple devices to complicated logic puzzles
A lot of hidden collectibles to find
Optional challenge rooms to overcome
Play solo or work together with friends, in up to 5-player multiplayer
